title: Exterior and Interior Luxury Superior Car Valet Service for £34 at All Klean (£85 Value)

• Head to toe treatments

title: CookeryClass for Two People including Two Course À La Carte Meal with a Drink for £25.50 atArbutus (£63.40 Value)
highlights:
• Learn how to cook the main course with Head Chef Barry Dallat

  • Organic produce where possible, local beef
  • Lays claim to title as Ireland's "Greenest Restaurant"

highlights:
